function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased rainfall leads to increased prevalence of the anopheles vector, resulting in a greater need for malaria control strategies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data paucity and lack of actionable insights hinder the characterization of the magnitude and complexity of the malaria problem, particularly in the context of climate change and urbanization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urbanization increases demand for intervention technologies, leading to greater demand for malaria prevention products.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low socioeconomic status and poverty are significant risk factors for malaria transmission due to reduced opportunities for education and lack of access to disease treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic residence plays a role in malaria transmission, with different anopheles species prevalent in specific regions, creating varying demand for intervention technologies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urbanization as a reinforcing factor on constraints to the use of insecticide-treated nets (ITNs) as an intervention strategy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap between public health champions and construction trades may limit the effectiveness of housing modification for malaria control.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited engagement and education within intervention strategies for malaria control.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to develop concerted efforts for the future in addressing malaria transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of involvement of built environment professionals in malaria intervention programs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transformative impact in managing VBDs like malaria","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for convergence between health and built environment sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of convergence between health and built environment sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of long-term financial sustainability for malaria prevention efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality-related concerns over drug efficacy, safety, and surveillance for malaria prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of malaria deaths in sub-Saharan Africa","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of long-term financial sustainability for malaria intervention programs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opposing trend of decreasing malaria cases and increasing costs for prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality-related concerns over drug efficacy, safety, and surveillance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate approach to managing the risk of vector-borne diseases like malaria","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of malaria in developing and emerging economies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of malaria-related deaths in sub-Saharan Africa","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of VBD-related deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) such as malaria, dengue fever, etc.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of VBD-related deaths in sub-Saharan Africa","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued investment in malaria-related intervention programs in SSA","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short lifespan of study in a quickly evolving social media ecosystem","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccuracy of information on wearing masks in coronavirus prevention articles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias introduced by the use of buzzsumo in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate information on masks and virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of social media platforms’ efforts to remove misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low presence of accurate information in peer-reviewed journals and official institutions' websites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of false information about COVID-19 prevention measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading articles on COVID-19 prevention measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to wearing masks due to misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading articles about coronavirus prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excessive reliance on non-affiliated and non-peer-reviewed sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate sharing of inaccurate information on social media platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on inaccurate or misleading information about contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disagreements and doubts in the classification process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of
